description: Get API health status. No input required. Returns HealthStatus with status (String: 'healthy', 'degraded', 'unhealthy'), timestamp (DateTime), uptime (Float, seconds), version (String), services (array of ServiceHealth with name, status, latency, lastChecked). Checks database connectivity, S3 availability, and external service health. Public endpoint - no authentication required. Also available as REST endpoint at /health.
graphql_operation: query GetHealth { health { apiHealth { status timestamp uptime version services { name status latency } } } }
